page.description: Class support BSON data parsing and creation.

methodref.name: CreateFromResultSet
methodref.description: Stream a SQL Result to a BSON file (sequential BSON documents = sequential result set rows).

methodref.name: CreateTempResultSet
methodref.description: Creates a temporary BSON file from a resultset, then apply an order and optional options (and columns) to get a new open resultset that modifys the order.

methodref.name: FileToResultSet
methodref.description: Create a result set from bson and optional order expresion, options ("","distict" or "distict row") and table info (schema).

methodref.name: ToResultSet
methodref.description: Create a result set from bson and optional order expresion, options ("","distict" or "distict row") and table info (schema).

methodref.name: getIndexed
methodref.description: Get indexed item from a JSON object - returns NIL if undefined.

methodref.name: getLength
methodref.description: Get Length of array / count of elements at level.

methodref.name: getProperty
methodref.description: Get property from a JSON object - returns NIL if undefined.

methodref.name: nameIndexed
methodref.description: Return the associated name (blank if none).

methodref.name: setIndexed
methodref.description: Set indexed data to array index.

methodref.name: setProperty
methodref.description: Get property from a JSON object.
